article.title: O'Donnell Assigned to Office of the Undersecretary of Defense (Acquisition, Technology and Logistics)

tags.tag: Office of the Undersecretary of Defense for Acquisition

article.text: Christopher C. O'Donnell has been appointed to the Senior Executive Service and is assigned as the director, Joint Rapid Acquisition Cell, Office of the Undersecretary of Defense (Acquisition, Technology and Logistics), Washington, D.C.
